LPJmL
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which LPJmL installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using LPJmL, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load LPJmL/4.0.003-iimpi-2020b
```
